Create rpt_kri_site_detail output for Make_Snapshot()

Source: R/util-MakeSnapshotHelpers.R
MakeRptSiteKriDetails.Rd

Create rpt_kri_site_detail output for Make_Snapshot()

MakeRptSiteKriDetails(
  lResults,
  status_site,
  meta_workflow,
  meta_param = NULL,
  gsm_analysis_date = NULL
)

Arguments

lResults

list the output from Study_Assess()

status_site

data.frame the output from Site_Map_Raw()

meta_workflow

string the meta_workflow stated in lMeta argument of Make_Snapshot()

meta_param

string the meta_param stated in lMeta argument of Make_Snapshot()

gsm_analysis_date

string the gsm analysis date calculated in Make_Snapshot(). leave NULL if dealing with stacked results

Contents

Developed by George Wu, Jeremy Wildfire, Matt Roumaya, Nathan Kosiba, Douglas Sanders, Spencer Childress, Li Ge, Zhongkai Wang, Colleen McLaughlin, Chelsea Dickens, Maya Gans, Jacob Anderson.
